mapper.select: SELECT uam.*, u.korean_name AS approver_name, uc.position AS approver_position FROM user_approver_mapping_tb uam JOIN user_tb u ON uam.approver_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN user_company_tb uc ON uam.approver_id = uc.user_id AND uam.company_id = uc.company_id WHERE uam.user_id = #{userId} AND uam.company_id = #{companyId} AND (uam.is_active IS NULL OR uam.is_active = 1) ORDER BY uam.priority ASC, uam.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_approver_mapping_tb ( user_id, approver_id, company_id, priority, is_active ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{approverId}, #{companyId}, COALESCE(#{priority}, 1), COALESCE(#{isActive}, 1) )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_approver_mapping_tb SET priority = #{priority}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE mapping_id = #{mappingId} AND company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.korean_name, u.email, uc.position, uc.role, uc.is_active, u.company_id, uc.approval_status, uc.is_approver AS isApprover FROM user_approver_mapping_tb uam JOIN user_tb u ON uam.approver_id = u.user_id JOIN user_company_tb uc ON uam.approver_id = uc.user_id AND uam.company_id = uc.company_id WHERE uam.user_id = #{userId} AND uam.company_id = #{companyId} AND (uam.is_active IS NULL OR uam.is_active = 1) AND uc.approval_status = 'APPROVED' AND uc.is_approver = 1 AND (uc.is_active IS NULL OR uc.is_active = 1) ORDER BY uam.priority ASC, u.korean_name ASC
